defaultnote_easy: Visit the linked page and delete your account.
defaultnote_email: Send an email to the provided address and request account deletion.
extensionp1: When you are on a website that is listed on JustDeleteMe, the extension will add a small dot to the omnibar. Clicking on this dot will take you to the relevant delete page.

guideexplanations: The links above are colour-coded to indicate the difficulty level of account deletion:
guidehard: Cannot be fully deleted without contacting customer services
guidelimited: Account can only be deleted if you live in a location with privacy rights
name: English
noresults: Can't find what you're looking for?

tagline: A directory of direct links to delete your account from web services.
title: Just Delete Me | A directory of direct links to delete your account from web services.
whatisthis3: techniques to make it difficult to find how to delete your account. JustDeleteMe aims to be a directory of urls to enable you to easily delete your account from web services.
whatisthis4: Got a site you think should be added?
